p: Experiment 2 was carried out in strict accordance with the Committee for Ethics in the Use of Human Beings (approval number: 88/2008) of Anhanguera Educacional, Brazil. After analyzing all the normative documents, the research was analyzed by professionals in order to be approved. The study protocol was recorded in the World Health Organization (WHO) International Clinical Trials Registry Platform (ICTRP) and approved by the Brazilian Registry of Clinical Trials (Protocol number: RBR-2bzdm3).
